statements: SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT id, source1_data FROM table1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, source2_data FROM table1 WHERE source1_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT source1_data, source2_data FROM table1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE source1_data LIKE '%value%';
SELECT id, source1_data, source2_data FROM table1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, source1_data, source2_data FROM table1 WHERE source1_data LIKE '%keyword%';
SELECT source1_data, COUNT(*) FROM table1 GROUP BY source1_data;
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, source2_data, CONCAT(source1_data, ' - ', source2_data) AS concatenated_data FROM table1 WHERE source2_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Table1 WHERE column1 = 10;
SELECT column2, column3 FROM Table1 ORDER BY column3 DESC;
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM Table1 WHERE column1 > 5 ORDER BY column2 ASC;
SELECT column5, column4 FROM Table2 WHERE column6 > 1000;
SELECT column2, column3 FROM Table1 WHERE column2 LIKE '%example%';
SELECT column1, column2 FROM Table1 WHERE column3 > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY column1 DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT column2, column1 FROM Table1 WHERE column3 < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY column2 ASC;
SELECT column3, column1, column2 FROM Table1 WHERE column1 = 10 AND column2 LIKE '%example%';
SELECT column5, column4 FROM Table2 WHERE column5 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY column4;
SELECT column6, column4, column5 FROM Table2 WHERE column6 >= 100.50;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT column2, column3 FROM table2 WHERE column4 = 10;
SELECT column1, column5, column9 FROM table3 WHERE column7 = 5 ORDER BY column5 DESC;
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM table1 WHERE column1 BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT column1, column6 FROM table2 WHERE column6 > 100 ORDER BY column6 ASC;
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE column1 = 10;
SELECT column2, column3 FROM table2 WHERE column6 > 50;
SELECT column4, column5, column6 FROM table3 WHERE column7 IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM table1 JOIN table2 ON table1.column1 = table2.column4;
SELECT column8, column9 FROM table3 WHERE column7 = 5 ORDER BY column9 DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT column2, column1 FROM table2;
SELECT column4 FROM table3 WHERE column5 = TRUE;
SELECT column2, column1, column3 FROM table2 WHERE column3 > 10;
SELECT column5, column4 FROM table3 WHERE column4 LIKE '%example%';
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table1 WHERE column1 > 100 ORDER BY column1 DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT column2, column1 FROM table1 INNER JOIN table2 ON table1.column1 = table2.column1 WHERE table1.column2 LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY column1 ASC, column3 DESC;
SELECT column4, column5 FROM table3 WHERE column5 = TRUE ORDER BY column4 ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT column4, COUNT(column4) AS count FROM table3 GROUP BY column4 HAVING count > 2 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT column7, DATE(column6) AS date FROM table4 WHERE DATE(column6) = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC, column7;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT name, region FROM sales_representatives WHERE region = 'West';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, email DESC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;

SELECT sales.sale_id, orders.order_date, products.name, sales.quantity, (sales.quantity * products.price) AS total_sale_amount FROM sales JOIN orders ON sales.order_id = orders.order_id JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customers.name, customers.email, COUNT(orders.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;

SELECT sales_representatives.name, sales.region, SUM(sales.sale_amount) AS total_sales_amount FROM sales_representatives JOIN sales ON sales_representatives.rep_id = sales.rep_id GROUP BY sales_representatives.name ORDER BY total_sales_amount DESC;
